oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Laboratory assessment of crop tolerance to selective flaming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vanhala, Petri
Rahkonen, Jukka
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We developed a laboratory method which enables researchers of thermal weed control to assess crop tolerance to selective flaming. We have tested cabbage and red beet tolerance to flaming with this method.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Vanhala, Petri and Rahkonen, Jukka (1998) Laboratory assessment of crop tolerance to selective flaming. Paper at: 3rd EWRS workshop on physical weed control, Wye College, UK, 23-25 March 1998.
